sen.e: FUJIWARA no Tomoyasu (Birth date unknown-977) was the retainer of Imperial Court during the mid-Heian Period.

sen.j: 藤原長良の流れを汲む中級貴族で、一条堀川に住んだ。
sen.e: He was the middle class noble, who favored the way of FUJIWARA no Nagara and lived in Ichijo Horikawa.
